snippet: RAPPOPORT--Gerald, of Long Beach, NY passed away June 3. Left to honor his memory are his wife of 68 years, Beulah; his children Bruce and Judy Rappoport, Diane Rappoport and Nancy Walzog; grandchildren Eric and Barbara Rappoport, Adam and Lindsay Rappo- port, Nielsen and Jari Walzog, and great-granddaughter Maya Rappoport. Please make donations to: Second Marine Division Association, PO Box 8180, Camp Lejeune, NC 28547. 1/3
lead_paragraph: RAPPOPORT--Gerald, of Long Beach, NY passed away June 3. Left to honor his memory are his wife of 68 years, Beulah; his children Bruce and Judy Rappoport, Diane Rappoport and Nancy Walzog; grandchildren Eric and Barbara Rappoport, Adam and Lindsay Rappo- port, Nielsen and Jari Walzog, and great-granddaughter Maya Rappoport. Please make donations to: Second Marine Division Association, PO Box 8180, Camp Lejeune, NC 28547. 1/3
